PMC FTI Storage
PMCs must maintain all FTI created for upfront verification or Post Award Audits (PAA) in the restricted FTI File Repository (FFR).  IVMs may be stored in orange light-weight folders or in the FFR.
Note
:  FTI related to IVMs or to upfront verification and PAAs can be viewed via the restricted FTI DOCUMENTS tab within the Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS).
